originalText.text: Dr. Ferreira is an excellent vataract & glaucoma specialist. I especially appreciate the care and precision of his diagnosis and treament. Be forewarned, his appt schedule is very tight with long wait times. Be parient.

text.text: Dr. Ferreira is an excellent vataract & glaucoma specialist. I especially appreciate the care and precision of his diagnosis and treament. Be forewarned, his appt schedule is very tight with long wait times. Be parient.

originalText.text: Dr Ferreira is very professional & knowledgeable, he has the ability to put your mind at ease. He takes the time to explain your issues and what it takes to resolve them. He talks to you straight and to the point. He's very refreshing.

text.text: Dr Ferreira is very professional & knowledgeable, he has the ability to put your mind at ease. He takes the time to explain your issues and what it takes to resolve them. He talks to you straight and to the point. He's very refreshing.

originalText.text:
He is very knowledgeable and gives insightful treatment plans. He is thorough and he values your person and concerns. Originally took a partner to see him and was impressed. A year later, I went for my own exam... to my surprise he remembered me.

Wait time can be extensive so plan to stay 2 hours or so. I didn't mind because of his caring and informed value of service; something too rare.

Thankful and looking forward to future  eye wellness visits.

originalText.text: I was really impressed. The attention of Dr. Ferreira and his staff is superb no matter which of his offices you visit. I had the cataract and glaucoma surgery on my right eye and everyone made me feel very comfortable and the attention to details was great. I feel very grateful. Thank you so much Dr. Ferreira and all the good people who work there.

originalText.text: I feel confident with Dr Ferreira as my eye doctor. Being a patient of his over the years I recognize his ability to deliver top class care. I will not be satisfied with no other
